name: GetMonitorNotificationRules
description:
Retrieve all monitor notification rules from Datadog.

Call this tool to get a comprehensive list of all monitor notification rules configured in Datadog.

parameters.name: starting_page_number
parameters.description: The page number to begin pagination. Defaults to the first page if not specified.

value_schema.description: The page to start paginating from. If `page` is not specified, the argument defaults to the first page.

parameters.name: number_of_rules_per_page
parameters.description: The number of rules to return per page. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

value_schema.description: The number of rules to return per page. If `per_page` is not specified, the argument defaults to 100.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: String for sort order. Example: `name:asc`. Directions: `asc`, `desc`. Fields: `name`, `created_at`.

value_schema.description: String for sort order, composed of field and sort order separated by a colon, for example `name:asc`. Supported sort directions: `asc`, `desc`. Supported fields: `name`, `created_at`.

parameters.name: filter_criteria
parameters.description: JSON string to filter rules by text, tags, or recipients. Use keys: `text`, `tags`, `recipients`.

value_schema.description:
JSON-encoded filter object. Supported keys:
* `text`: Free-text query matched against rule name, tags, and recipients.
* `tags`: Array of strings. Return rules that have any of these tags.
* `recipients`: Array of strings. Return rules that have any of these recipients.

parameters.name: include_related_resources
parameters.description: Specify related resources to include in the response, such as `created_by`. Use a comma-separated list.

value_schema.description:
Comma-separated list of resource paths for related resources to include in the response. Supported resource
path is `created_by`.
